about_the_game:
Welcome to Neo-Chicago, a city on the brink of a spectacular renaissance where technology and culture weave a new tapestry of urban life, offering unparalleled opportunities for growth and advancement. Yet, beneath this glittering facade of progress, shadows lurk. Unscrupulous forces are at play, seeking to exploit the zeitgeist for their nefarious purposes, turning this era of innovation into a playground for manipulation and deceit.

Enter Devin, a psychic detective with a keen mind and an even keener psychic prowess, and his sophisticated AI sidekick, AV1NA. Together, they form an indomitable duo, navigating the neon-lit streets of New-Chi to unravel mysteries that baffle the ordinary mind. In this cutting-edge Psy-Fi murder mystery game, players are thrust into a world where intuition and technology collide.

As Devin and AV1NA, players will use a combination of psychic abilities and advanced artificial intelligence to solve intricate puzzles, interact with a cast of richly drawn characters, and untangle a web of intrigue that threatens the very heart of Neo-Chicago. Players will delve deep into a narrative that challenges the very concept of reality and identity, all while safeguarding the citizens of this futuristic metropolis.

Prepare yourself for a gaming experience like no other, where your wits, courage, and heart will be tested against the backdrop of a city that represents the best and worst of what the future may hold. Will you rise to the challenge and keep the dream of Neo-Chicago alive, or will you succumb to the darkness that seeks to engulf it? The fate of New-Chi rests in your hands.
